00077 uint8_t destipAddr[16] = {0x20, 0x01, 0x49, 0x78, 0x01, 0xE1, 0x00, 0x00, 0x02, 0x1C, 0x23, 0xFF, 0XFE, 0x2B, 0xBD, 0x6C};

00080 uint8_t googleipAddr[16] = {0x20, 0x01, 0x48, 0x60, 0xB0, 0x06, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0X00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x68};
00081 uint8_t serveripAddr[16] = {0x20, 0x01, 0x05, 0xC0, 0x10, 0x00, 0x00, 0x0B, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0X00, 0x00, 0x11, 0x4D};
00082 //uint8_t backupipAddr[16] = {0x2A, 0x01, 0x02, 0x40, 0xFE, 0x00, 0x00, 0x73, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0X00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x02};

00084 /* Command to send remote node */
00085 #define COMMAND_PING 0
00086 #define COMMAND_UDP 1
00087 
00088 static char remoteCommand[50];
00089 static uint8_t remoteCommandLen = 0;
00090 static uint8_t remoteAction = COMMAND_PING;
00091 static uint8_t pingSequence = 0;
00092 
00093 
00094 /* Response to Command*/
00095 static char remoteCommandResponse[25];
00096 static uint8_t remoteCommandResponseLen = 0;
00097 static uint32_t remoteCommandResponseTime = 0;
00098 static uint32_t PingSendTime = 0;
00099 
00100 #define UDP_PORT_TFTP     69
00101 #define UDP_PORT_COMMANDS 0xF0B0
00102 #define UDP_PORT_RESPONSE 0xF0B1
00103 #define UDP_PORT_ADMIN    0xF0B2
00104 #define UDP_PORT_SENSOR   0xF0B3
00105 #define UDP_PORT_DSKDEMO  0xF0B4

00107 #if APP == IPSO

00109 static double temperature = 22.3;
00110 static double humidity = 9.5;
00111 static double light = 25;

00138 void sixlowpan_ping_usercall(uint8_t sequence)
00139 {
00140     remoteCommandResponseTime = macGetTime();
00141 
00142     uint32_t timeDiff;
00143 
00144     timeDiff = remoteCommandResponseTime - PingSendTime;
00145 
00146     remoteCommandResponseLen =
00147         sprintf(remoteCommandResponse, "Ping took %ld mS\n",
00148                 timeDiff);
00149 
00150     // Alert the application
00151     appSixlowpanPingResponse();
00152 }

00161 uint8_t sixlowpan_udp_usercall(uint16_t sourceport, uint16_t destport,
00162                             uint8_t * payload, uint8_t payloadlen,
00163                             uint8_t payloadmax, ipbuf_t * ipbuf)
00164 {
00165     /* Commands to the sensor are accepted on port 0xF0B0 */
00166     if (destport == UDP_PORT_COMMANDS)
00167     {
00168 #if APP==IPSO || defined (DOXYGEN)
00169         char response[40];
00170         unsigned char respindex = 0;
00171         uint8_t * origpayload = payload;
00172 
00173         while(payloadlen)
00174         {
00175             switch(*payload)
00176             {
00177 
00178                 case 'T': /* Temperature */
00179                     response[respindex++] = 'T';
00180                     respindex += sprintf(&response[respindex], "%1.1f", temperature);
00181                     break;
00182 
00183                 case 'L': /* Light Sensor */
00184                     response[respindex++] = 'L';
00185                     respindex += sprintf(&response[respindex], "%1.1f", light);
00186                     break;
00187 
00188                 case 'H': /* Humidity */
00189                     response[respindex++] = 'H';
00190                     respindex += sprintf(&response[respindex], "%1.1f", humidity);
00191                     break;
00192 
00193                 case 'A': /* LED Status / Set */
00194 
00195                     //If next character involves \r or \n this is a query
00196                     if ( (*(payload + 1) == '\r') || (*(payload + 1) == '\n') )
00197                     {
00198                         response[respindex++] = 'A';
00199                         response[respindex++] = ledStatus;
00200                         break;
00201 
00202                     //Otherwise this is a command
00203                     }
00204                     else
00205                     {
00206                         payload++;
00207                         payloadlen--;
00208 
00209                         //'1' means turn LED on
00210                         if ( *payload == '1')
00211                         {
00212                             ledStatus = '1';
00213                             if((PLATFORM==RAVEN) && SERIAL)
00214                                 serial_send_frame(REPORT_LED, 1, (u8 *)"1");
00215                             else
00216                                 LED_ON(2);
00217                         }
00218                         //'0' means turn LED off
00219                         else if ( *payload == '0')
00220                         {
00221                             ledStatus = '0';
00222                             if((PLATFORM==RAVEN) && SERIAL)
00223                                 serial_send_frame(REPORT_LED, 1, (u8 *)"0");
00224                             else
00225                                 LED_OFF(2);
00226                         }
00227                         //Unknown command!
00228                         else
00229                         {
00230                             response[respindex++] = 0xFF;
00231                             response[respindex++] = 'A';
00232                             response[respindex++] = *payload;
00233                         }
00234                     }
00235                     break;
00236 
00237                 case '\r':
00238                 case '\n':
00239 
00240                     response[respindex++] = *payload;
00241                     break;
00242 
00243                 default:
00244 
00245                     /* Print 0xFF followed by unknown command */
00246                     response[respindex++] = 0xFF;
00247                     response[respindex++] = *payload;
00248             }
00249             payloadlen--;
00250             payload++;
00251         }
00252 
00253         memcpy(origpayload, response, respindex);
00254         return respindex;
00255 
00256     /* Responses to commands are accepted on port 0xF0B1 */
00257     }
00258     else if (destport == UDP_PORT_RESPONSE)
00259     {
00260         memcpy(remoteCommandResponse, payload, payloadlen);
00261         remoteCommandResponseLen = payloadlen;
00262         remoteCommandResponseTime = macGetTime();
00263 
00264         return 0;
00265 
00266 
00267     /* Administration Commands are accepted on port 0xF0B2 */
00268     }
00269     else if (destport == UDP_PORT_ADMIN)
00270     {
00271         uint8_t i, tempbyte;
00272 
00273         switch (*payload)
00274         {
00275             case 'S': /**** Set destination IP address for the server */
00276                 //Check payload is long enough to contain a full IP address
00277                 if (payloadlen < 40)
00278                 {
00279                     strcpy((char *)payload, "Length Error\r\n");
00280                     return 14;
00281                 }
00282 
00283                 sscanf((char *)(payload + 1), "%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%x\r\n", (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[0], (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[2], (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[4],
00284                    (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[6], (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[8], (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[10],
00285                    (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[12], (unsigned int *)&serveripAddr[14]);
00286 
00287                 /* Switch to proper byte order */
00288                                for(i = 0; i < 16; i += 2)
00289                                {
00290                                    tempbyte = serveripAddr[i + 1];
00291                                    serveripAddr[i+1] = serveripAddr[i];
00292                                    serveripAddr[i] = tempbyte;
00293                                }
00294 
00295                 break;
00296 
00297             case 'D': /**** Set destination IP address for button press */
00298 
00299                 //Check if we are sending to 'server' address
00300                 if (*(char *)(payload + 1) == 's')
00301                 {
00302                     memcpy(destipAddr, serveripAddr, 16);
00303                     break;
00304                 }
00305 
00306                 //Check payload is long enough to contain a full IP address
00307                 if (payloadlen < 40)
00308                 {
00309                     strcpy((char *)payload, "Length Error\r\n");
00310                     return 14;
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 sscanf((char *)(payload + 1), "%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%x\r\n", (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[0], (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[2], (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[4],
00314                                                                 (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[6], (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[8], (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[10],
00315                                                                 (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[12], (unsigned int *)&destipAddr[14]);
00316 
00317                 /* Switch to proper byte order */
00318                 for(i = 0; i < 16; i += 2)
00319                 {
00320                     tempbyte = destipAddr[i + 1];
00321                     destipAddr[i+1] = destipAddr[i];
00322                     destipAddr[i] = tempbyte;
00323                 }
00324 
00325                 break;
00326 
00327             case 'B': /**** Set action to perform on button press */
00328 
00329                 switch( *(payload + 1) )
00330                 {
00331                     case 'S': /* Send this to node: */
00332 
00333                         remoteCommandLen = payloadlen - 2;
00334                         memcpy(remoteCommand, payload + 2, remoteCommandLen);
00335 
00336                         /* If string ends with \n with no \r infront
00337                          * of it, we put one there, as the user probably wanted one! */
00338                         if ((*(payload + payloadlen - 1) == '\n') && (*(payload + payloadlen - 2) != '\r'))
00339                         {
00340                             *(remoteCommand + remoteCommandLen - 1) = '\r';
00341                             *(remoteCommand + remoteCommandLen) = '\n';
00342 
00343                             remoteCommandLen++;
00344                         }
00345                         remoteAction = COMMAND_UDP;
00346                         break;
00347 
00348                     case 'P': /* Ping this node */
00349                         remoteAction = COMMAND_PING;
00350                         break;
00351 
00352                     default:
00353                         strcpy((char *)payload, "Unknown Command\r\n");
00354                         return 17;
00355                         break;
00356                 }
00357 
00358                 break;
00359 
00360             case 'G': /**** Get response from last command sent to remote node */
00361 
00362                 if (remoteCommandResponseLen == 0)
00363                 {
00364                     strcpy((char *)payload, "No response\r\n");
00365                     return 13;
00366                 }
00367 
00368                 uint8_t timestampoffset = sprintf((char *)payload, "[%ld]  ", remoteCommandResponseTime);
00369 
00370                 memcpy(payload + timestampoffset, remoteCommandResponse, remoteCommandResponseLen);
00371                 return remoteCommandResponseLen + timestampoffset;
00372 
00373                 break;
00374 
00375             case 'C': /**** Clear response from last commmand sent to remote node */
00376 
00377                 remoteCommandResponseLen = 0;
00378                 break;
00379 
00380             case 'H': /**** Hit button (simulate it) */
00381                 simulateButton = 1;
00382                 break;
00383 
00384             case 'w': /**** WAKE UP */
00385                 if (!VLP)
00386                 {
00387                     macConfig.sleeping = false;
00388                     strcpy((char *)payload, "awake\r\n");
00389                     return 7;
00390                 }
00391                 else
00392                 {
00393                     strcpy((char *)payload, "VLP mode (wake disabled)\r\n");
00394                     return 26;
00395                 }
00396 
00397 
00398             default:
00399                 strcpy((char *)payload, "Unknown Command\r\n");
00400                 return 17;
00401 
00402         }
00403 
00404         strcpy((char *)payload, "OK\r\n");
00405         return 4;
00406 #else
00407         strcpy((char *)payload, "IPSO app disabled\r\n");
00408         return 19;
00409 #endif
00410 
00411     }
00412     /* SENSOR Application */
00413     else if (destport == UDP_PORT_SENSOR)
00414     {
00415 #if APP == SENSOR || defined(DOXYGEN)
00416         /* Reset user payload, and call sensor receive */
00417         udpPayload = payload;
00418         udpPayloadLen = 0;
00419         udpPayloadMaxLen = payloadmax;
00420         sensorRcvPacket(payload);
00421 
00422         udpPayload = NULL;
00423 
00424         return udpPayloadLen;
00425 #else // APP == IPSO
00426         if((PLATFORM==RAVEN) && SERIAL)
00427         {
00428             u8 index = 0;
00429             while(payload[index] != 0x0A)
00430                 if(index++ > 10)
00431                     break;
00432             payload[index] = 0;
00433             serial_send_frame(REPORT_TEXT_MSG, strlen((char *)payload)+1, (u8 *)payload);
00434             strcpy((char *)payload, "OK\r\n");
00435             return 4;
00436         }
00437         else
00438         {
00439             strcpy((char *)payload, "Disabled.\r\n");
00440             return 11;
00441         }
00442 #endif
00443 
00444     }
00445 
00446     /* DSK001 Demo Application */
00447     else if (destport == UDP_PORT_DSKDEMO)
00448     {
00449 #if APP==DSKIPDEMO || defined (DOXYGEN)
00450 
00451 #if PLATFORM != DSK001
00452         strcpy((char *)payload, "WRONG PLATFORM\r\n");
00453         return 14;
00454 #endif
00455 
00456         if (ipbuf->srcmode == SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_I)
00457         {
00458             memcpy(dskDestAddr, ipbuf->srcptr, 16);
00459             dskDestPort = sourceport;
00460             strcpy((char *)payload, "OK\r\n");
00461             return 4;
00462         }
00463         else
00464         {
00465             strcpy((char *)payload, "Error\r\n");
00466             return 7;
00467         }
00468 
00469 
00470 #endif
00471 
00472     }
00473     /* TFTP Port */
00474     else if (destport == UDP_PORT_TFTP)
00475     {
00476 
00477         static uint16_t expectedBlock;
00478         uint8_t * tftpPayload = payload;
00479 
00480 #if RUMSLEEP
00481         /* Sleeping enabled - take out of sleep mode if not VLP.
00482          * If VLP switch to a faster timeout */
00483         if (VLP)
00484         {
00485            SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME = 2;
00486            SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_APP_TIME = 0;
00487         }
00488         else
00489         {
00490             macConfig.sleeping = false;
00491         }
00492 #endif
00493 
00494         /* Only support write request in binary: Opcode = 2 */
00495         if ((*(tftpPayload + 0) == 0x00) &&
00496             (*(tftpPayload + 1) == 0x02))
00497         {
00498             //Point to filename
00499             tftpPayload += 2;
00500 
00501             //Find end of filename
00502             while (*tftpPayload)
00503                 tftpPayload++;
00504 
00505             //Point to file transfer mode
00506             tftpPayload++;
00507 
00508             //Check we are using binary file transfer mode
00509             if ((*(tftpPayload + 0) == 'o') &&
00510                 (*(tftpPayload + 1) == 'c') &&
00511                 (*(tftpPayload + 2) == 't') &&
00512                 (*(tftpPayload + 3) == 'e') &&
00513                 (*(tftpPayload + 4) == 't') &&
00514                 (*(tftpPayload + 5) == 0x00))
00515             {
00516 
00517                 //Point to options
00518                 tftpPayload += 6;
00519 
00520                 //We only accept requests with a size of
00521                 //64 bytes per data node!
00522                 if ((*(tftpPayload + 0) == 'b') &&
00523                     (*(tftpPayload + 1) == 'l') &&
00524                     (*(tftpPayload + 2) == 'k') &&
00525                     (*(tftpPayload + 3) == 's') &&
00526                     (*(tftpPayload + 4) == 'i') &&
00527                     (*(tftpPayload + 5) == 'z') &&
00528                     (*(tftpPayload + 6) == 'e') &&
00529                     (*(tftpPayload + 7) == 0x00) &&
00530                     (*(tftpPayload + 8) == '6') &&
00531                     (*(tftpPayload + 9) == '4') &&
00532                     (*(tftpPayload + 10) == 0x00))
00533                 {
00534                     //Reset payload
00535                     tftpPayload = payload;
00536 
00537                     *tftpPayload++ = 0x00;
00538                     *tftpPayload++ = 0x06;
00539                     *tftpPayload++ = 'b';
00540                     *tftpPayload++ = 'l';
00541                     *tftpPayload++ = 'k';
00542                     *tftpPayload++ = 's';
00543                     *tftpPayload++ = 'i';
00544                     *tftpPayload++ = 'z';
00545                     *tftpPayload++ = 'e';
00546                     *tftpPayload++ = 0x00;
00547                     *tftpPayload++ = '6';
00548                     *tftpPayload++ = '4';
00549                     *tftpPayload++ = 0x00;
00550 
00551                     //Reset this
00552                     sixlowpan_tftpData(NULL, 0);
00553 
00554                     expectedBlock = 1;
00555 
00556                     return 13;
00557                 }
00558             }
00559         }
00560         /* Data Packet: Opcode = 3 */
00561         else if ((*(tftpPayload + 0) == 0x00) &&
00562                  (*(tftpPayload + 1) == 0x03))
00563         {
00564             uint16_t actualBlock;
00565 
00566             actualBlock =  *(tftpPayload + 3);
00567             actualBlock += (*(tftpPayload + 2) << 8);
00568 
00569             //Received the proper data block
00570             if (actualBlock == expectedBlock)
00571             {
00572                 *(tftpPayload + 1) = 4; //Opcode 4 = ACK
00573                 expectedBlock++;
00574 
00575                 //Check if we are done
00576                 sixlowpan_tftpData(tftpPayload + 4, payloadlen - 4);
00577                 return 4;
00578             }
00579             //Our ACK must have got lost?
00580             else if (actualBlock < expectedBlock)
00581             {
00582                 *(tftpPayload + 1) = 4; //Opcode 4 = ACK
00583                 return 4;
00584             }
00585             //Block from the future... something bad happened
00586             else
00587             {
00588                 *(tftpPayload + 1) = 5; //OpCode 5 = error
00589                 *(tftpPayload + 2) = 0; //Error code = 0 (undefined)
00590                 *(tftpPayload + 3) = 0;
00591                 *(tftpPayload + 4) = 0; //No string sorry
00592                 return 5;
00593             }
00594         }
00595 
00596         return 0;
00597 
00598     }
00599 
00600     /* Unknown port */
00601     else
00602     {
00603         strcpy((char *)payload, "Unknown port\r\n");
00604         return 14;
00605     }
00606 
00607     return payloadlen;
00608 }
00609 
00616 void sixlowpan_tftpData(uint8_t * data, uint8_t len)
00617 {
00618     static uint32_t address;
00619     static uint16_t byteCnt;
00620     static uint8_t  spmBuf[SPM_PAGESIZE];
00621     uint8_t         lastPacket = 0;
00622     uint8_t         haveRoom = 0;
00623 
00624 
00625     if (data == NULL)
00626     {
00627         address = BOOTLOADER_INITIAL_ADDR;
00628         byteCnt = 0;
00629         return;
00630     }
00631 
00632     //Check we have room
00633     if ((address + SPM_PAGESIZE) > MAX_BOOTSIZE)
00634     {
00635         haveRoom = 0;
00636     }
00637     else
00638     {
00639         haveRoom = 1;
00640     }
00641 
00642     //Check for last packet
00643     if (len != 64)
00644     {
00645         lastPacket = 1;
00646     }
00647 
00648     //Copy data over
00649     while(len)
00650     {
00651         spmBuf[byteCnt] = *data;
00652         data++;
00653         len--;
00654         byteCnt++;
00655     }
00656 
00657     //Check for full
00658     if (((byteCnt >= SPM_PAGESIZE) || (lastPacket)) && haveRoom)
00659     {
00660         boot_program_page(address, spmBuf);
00661         address += byteCnt;
00662         byteCnt = 0;
00663     }
00664 
00665 
00666     //Copy over to main FLASH if we ended
00667     if (lastPacket)
00668     {
00669         //boot_verify();
00670 
00671         //Give time for us to ACK last packet
00672         bootloaderEndAddress = address;
00673         macSetAlarm(100, boot_copy_program);
00674     }
00675 
00676 }
00677 
00687 void sixlowpan_application_periodic(void)
00688 {
00689 #if APP == SENSOR || defined(DOXYGEN)
00690     sendReading();
00691 #elif APP == IPSO
00692     uint8_t * addr_ptr;
00693     uint8_t strlength;
00694 
00695     if((APP==IPSO) && (SENSOR_TYPE==SENSOR_RANDOM_IPSO))
00696     {
00697         // Just send faked random data for demo
00698         radioSetTrxState(RX_AACK_ON); // Needed for good random number
00699         temperature = 70 + ((s8)radioRandom(8)/1000.0);
00700         humidity = 29 + ((s8)radioRandom(8)/1000.00);
00701         light = 270 + ((s8)radioRandom(8)/1000.0);
00702 //        UNCOMMENT FOR CELCIUS
00703 //        temperature = 20 + ((s8)radioRandom(8)/1000.0);
00704 //        humidity = 40 + ((s8)radioRandom(8)/1000.00);
00705 //        light = 60 + ((s8)radioRandom(8)/1000.0);
00706 
00707         // Bound ranges to typical office environment.
00708         if(temperature>70.1)
00709             temperature = 70.1;
00710         else if(temperature<69.9)
00711             temperature = 69.9;
00712 
00713         if(humidity>29.11)
00714             humidity = 29.11;
00715         else if(humidity<28.95)
00716             humidity = 28.95;
00717 
00718         if(light>270.1)
00719             light = 270.1;
00720         else if(light<269.9)
00721             light = 269.9;
00722 //        UNCOMMENT FOR CELCIUS
00723 //        if(temperature>25.1)
00724 //            temperature = 25.1;
00725 //        else if(temperature<16.9)
00726 //            temperature = 16.9;
00727 //
00728 //        if(humidity>42.11)
00729 //            humidity = 42.11;
00730 //        else if(humidity<39.95)
00731 //            humidity = 39.95;
00732 //
00733 //        if(light>61.1)
00734 //            light = 61.1;
00735 //        else if(light<58.9)
00736 //            light = 58.9;
00737     }
00738 
00739 //    if(toggle)
00740 //    {
00741         toggle = 0;
00742         /* Send to IPSO Server */
00743         addr_ptr = sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ipglobal();
00744         memcpy(addr_ptr, serveripAddr, 16);
00745 
00746         /* Send on port 0xF0B0 */
00747         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(UDP_PORT_RESPONSE, UDP_PORT_COMMANDS);
00748 
00749         strlength = sprintf((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "T%1.1f\r\nH%1.2f\r\nL%1.1f\r\n", temperature, humidity, light);
00750         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(strlength);
00751         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
00752 //    }
00753 //    else
00754 //    {
00755 //        toggle =1;
00756 //        /* Send to backup IPSO Server */
00757 //        addr_ptr = sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ipglobal();
00758 //        memcpy(addr_ptr, backupipAddr, 16);
00759 //
00760 //        /* Send on port 0xF0B0 */
00761 //        sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(UDP_PORT_RESPONSE, UDP_PORT_COMMANDS);
00762 //
00763 //        strlength = sprintf((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "T%1.1f\r\nH%1.2f\r\nL%1.1f\r\n", temperature, humidity, light);
00764 //        sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(strlength);
00765 //        sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
00766 //    }
00767 
00768 #elif APP == DSKIPDEMO
00769 
00770     static uint8_t waitForOn = 0;
00771     uint8_t * addr_ptr;
00772     uint8_t strlength;
00773     static uint32_t oldAccelSq;
00774 
00775     /* If we have port, set this up */
00776     if (!dskDestPort)
00777         return;
00778 
00779     if (!waitForOn)
00780     {
00781          addr_ptr = sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ipglobal();
00782          memcpy(addr_ptr, dskDestAddr, 16);
00783 
00784          sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(UDP_PORT_DSKDEMO, dskDestPort);
00785 
00786          HAL_INIT_ADC();
00787          HAL_ACCEL_INIT();
00788          HAL_ACCEL_ON();
00789 
00790         //We use AVCC as AREF, not the 1.1V reference
00791         ADMUX = 0x40;
00792 
00793         //Wait for the accelerometer to turn on (takes a few ms)
00794         macSetAlarm(4, sixlowpan_application_periodic);
00795         waitForOn = 1;
00796     }
00797     else
00798     {
00799         waitForOn = 0;
00800 
00801         HAL_SELECT_ACCELZ();
00802 
00803         for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00804         {
00805             HAL_SAMPLE_ADC();
00806             HAL_WAIT_ADC();
00807         }
00808 
00809         int16_t zaccel = HAL_READ_ADC() - 512;
00810 
00811         HAL_SELECT_ACCELY();
00812         for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00813         {
00814             HAL_SAMPLE_ADC();
00815             HAL_WAIT_ADC();
00816         }
00817 
00818         int16_t yaccel = HAL_READ_ADC() - 512;
00819 
00820         HAL_SELECT_ACCELX();
00821         for(uint8_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00822         {
00823             HAL_SAMPLE_ADC();
00824             HAL_WAIT_ADC();
00825         }
00826 
00827         HAL_ACCEL_OFF();
00828 
00829         int16_t xaccel = HAL_READ_ADC() - 512;
00830 
00831         int32_t totalAccelSq;
00832 
00833         totalAccelSq = ((int32_t)zaccel*(int32_t)zaccel) + ((int32_t)yaccel*(int32_t)yaccel) + ((int32_t)xaccel*(int32_t)xaccel);
00834 
00835         SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME = 4;
00836 
00837 
00838         //strlength = sprintf((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "%ld\r\n", totalAccelSq);
00839         //strlength = sprintf((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "X: %d Y:%d Z:%d\r\n", xaccel, yaccel, zaccel);
00840 
00841         if ((totalAccelSq < 15000) || (totalAccelSq > 25000))
00842         {
00843             strcpy((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "Coin falling\r\n");
00844             strlength = 14;
00845         }
00846         else if (zaccel < -10)
00847         {
00848             strcpy((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "HEADS\r\n");
00849             strlength = 7;
00850         }
00851         else if (zaccel > 10)
00852         {
00853             strcpy((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "TAILS\r\n");
00854             strlength = 7;
00855         }
00856         else
00857         {
00858             strcpy((char *)sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), "EDGE\r\n");
00859             strlength = 6;
00860         }
00861 
00862         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(strlength);
00863         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
00864     }
00865 
00866 #endif
00867 }
00868 
00873 void sixlowpan_application_init(void)
00874 {
00875 
00876 #if APP == DSKIPDEMO
00877     /* Ever 2 seconds check for disk activity */
00878     SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME = 20 ;
00879     SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_APP_TIME = 1;
00880 #elif ((APP == IPSO) && (SENSOR_TYPE != SENSOR_RANDOM_IPSO))
00881     SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_APP_TIME = 15;
00882 #elif ((APP == IPSO) && (SENSOR_TYPE == SENSOR_RANDOM_IPSO))
00883     SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_APP_TIME = 1;
00884 #endif
00885 
00886     return;
00887 }
00888 
00896 void sixlowpan_button(void)
00897 {
00898     uint8_t * addr_ptr;
00899 
00900     /* Reset response */
00901     remoteCommandResponseLen = 0;
00902 
00903     if (remoteAction == COMMAND_UDP)
00904     {
00905         addr_ptr = sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ipglobal();
00906     }
00907     else
00908     {
00909         addr_ptr = sixlowpan_hc01_ping_setup_ipglobal(++pingSequence);
00910     }
00911 
00912     memcpy(addr_ptr, destipAddr, 16);
00913 
00914     if (remoteAction == COMMAND_UDP)
00915     {
00916         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(UDP_PORT_RESPONSE, UDP_PORT_COMMANDS);
00917         memcpy( sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), remoteCommand, remoteCommandLen);
00918         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(remoteCommandLen);
00919         sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
00920     }
00921     else
00922     {
00923         PingSendTime = macGetTime();
00924         sixlowpan_hc01_ping_send();
00925     }
00926 
00927 
00928 }

00940 void sixlowpan_sensorReturn(u8 len, u8 * data)
00941 {
00942     if ((udpPayload) && (len <= udpPayloadMaxLen))
00943     {
00944         memcpy(udpPayload, data, len);
00945         udpPayloadLen = len;
00946     }
00947 }

00958 void sixlowpan_sensorSend(u16 addr, u8 len, u8 * data)
00959 {
00960     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_iplocal(addr);
00961     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(UDP_PORT_SENSOR, UDP_PORT_SENSOR);
00962     memcpy( sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), data, len);
00963     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(len);
00964     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
00965 }

00974 void sixlowpan_sensorPerSend(u8 len, u8 * data)
00975 {
00976     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_iplocal(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR);
00977     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(UDP_PORT_SENSOR, UDP_PORT_SENSOR);
00978     memcpy( sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(), data, len);
00979     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(len);
00980     sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
